content.query:
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [baubaisadls] WITH 
(	LOCATION = N'https://baubaisadfsaprod.blob.core.windows.net/'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [JurorEricDeltaLakeStorage] WITH 
(	TYPE = HADOOP,
	LOCATION = N'abfss://dl-juror-eric-voters-temp@baubaisadfsaprod.dfs.core.windows.net/'
);
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [JurorPotgresqlDataLakeStorage] WITH 
(	TYPE = HADOOP,
	LOCATION = N'abfss://juror-etl@baubaisadfsaprod.dfs.core.windows.net/'
);
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[er_juror_postgresql]
( 
	[part_no] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[register_lett] [int]  NULL,
	[poll_number] [int]  NULL,
	[new_marker] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[title] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[lname] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[fname] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[dob] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[flags] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[address] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address2] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address3] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address4] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address5] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address6] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[zip] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[date_selected1] [date]  NULL,
	[date_selected2] [date]  NULL,
	[date_selected3] [date]  NULL,
	[rec_num] [int]  NULL,
	[perm_disqual] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[source_id] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[postcode_start] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[hash_id] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[creation_date] [varchar](50)  NULL
)
WITH (DATA_SOURCE = [JurorPotgresqlDataLakeStorage], LOCATION = N'voters_postgresql/', FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat], REJECT_TYPE = VALUE, REJECT_VALUE = 0 )
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [dbo].[er_juror_report]
( 
	[part_no] [varchar](1)  NULL,
	[register_lett] [int]  NULL,
	[poll_number] [int]  NULL,
	[new_marker] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[title] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[lname] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[fname] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[dob] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[flags] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[address] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address2] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address3] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address4] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address5] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[address6] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[zip] [varchar](10)  NULL,
	[date_selected1] [date]  NULL,
	[date_selected2] [date]  NULL,
	[date_selected3] [date]  NULL,
	[rec_num] [int]  NULL,
	[perm_disqual] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[source_id] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[postcode_start] [varchar](20)  NULL,
	[hash_id] [varchar](100)  NULL,
	[creation_date] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[AdtclmnFirstCreatedDatetime] [date]  NULL,
	[AdtclmnInsertedByProcessName] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[AdtclmnModifiedDatetime] [date]  NULL,
	[AdtclmnModifiedByProcessName] [varchar](50)  NULL,
	[AdtclmnRecordActiveInd] [int]  NULL
)
WITH (DATA_SOURCE = [JurorEricDeltaLakeStorage], LOCATION = N'voters_deduplicated_delta/', FILE_FORMAT = [ParquetFormat], REJECT_TYPE = VALUE, REJECT_VALUE = 0 )
GO

SET ANSI_NULLS ON
GO
SET QUOTED_IDENTIFIER ON
GO

CREATE VIEW [dbo].[er_juror_report_view]
AS SELECT 
    creation_date, 
    rec_num, 
    COUNT(*) AS row_count
FROM 
    [dbo].[er_juror_report]
GROUP BY 
    creation_date, 
    rec_num;
GO
